Prime-exclusive discount

A lot of us have a bike, scooter, or something with tires in the garage, and airing them up has always felt like an annoying chore to me. items.title: Amazon just put the upgraded M4 Mac mini configs on sale: 2x storage and 24GB models now $110 off
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days will be gone for another year in less than 12 hours from now, but the upgraded Mac mini deals are making a late entrance…Better now than never I guess. The base model dropped down to $499 the second Prime Day made landfall, but you can now add the upgraded 16GB/512GB and the 24GB configurations to the mix – they are now $110 off the list prices. 

more…

items.title: Our favorite iPhone 17 accessories on sale for Prime Day from $9: Cases, cables, 25W chargers, SSDs, more
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day fall edition is set to wrap later tonight, but beforehand we are taking a closer look at our favorite iPhone 17 accessory deals. Million of folks just landed a new iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, or iPhone Air, and if you’re looking to score a deal on a new case, chargers, portable storage devices, cables, or anything else for it, Prime Day is the time to do it. We have all-time low pricing on official Apple accessories, Beats gear, portable power banks, Find My cards, and much more starting from $9 for today only.

more…

items.title: Shoot ProRes RAW straight from iPhone 17 to Lexar’s 1TB Go portable SSD at a new $100 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is currently offering Lexar’s tiny 1TB Professional Go portable SSD in silver for $99.88 shipped. This drive originally retailed for $150 and has recently sold for as high as $151, with its usual price hovering around $123. It briefly dropped to $105 earlier this year during the previous Prime Day sale, but today’s offer knocks it down to the $100 mark for the first time since its debut. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, and you can even get it bundled with a hub for $124.88 shipped. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Anker’s compact Nano 45W USB-C wall charger with bundled cable is down to $19 (Reg. $35)

Anker Nano 45W Type-C Wall Charger with Cable

Buy for $19 (Reg. $35)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

While we see smaller brands beat out prices like this fairly often, this is a solid price for an offering from the likes of Anker and some of the other more notable names out there. I like that Anker bundles a cable with this charger, which is a nice little bonus that some other brands don’t include.
